ygData.subject: Re: Lambent Armor?
ygData.msgSnippet: http://everquest.gamestats.com/quests/Q_Temple_Solusek.htm is my favorite Personally - I think you re too low for Lambent (particularly the stones) at 20
ygData.messageBody:
http://everquest.gamestats.com/quests/Q_Temple_Solusek.htm is my favorite
Personally - I think you're too low for Lambent (particularly the stones) at
20 unless you plan on simply waiting for someone to give up the loot. I
started at 28...

Slyde
